title: Interpretation of seeing a cement building in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a building with cement: If you see cement in a dream, this is evidence of the large amount of money that the dreamer will obtain and the abundance of sustenance. If you see cement in a dream, this is evidence that the dreamer will succeed from God in the coming days. But if you see a mixture of cement in a dream, this is evidence that The dreamer will achieve his ambitions, aspirations and goals. Seeing dry cement in a dream indicates that the dreamer can withstand the pressures and difficulties he is exposed to. He overcame many problems through his life and work. Seeing cement rotten and unfit for use is evidence of misguidance in the dreamer’s life. It could be a warning of That something is not good. And when you see cement, this is evidence of excellence and success and that he will achieve what he seeks in his dreams. Interpretation of a dream about cement in a dream for a single woman: Seeing cement for an unmarried girl is evidence of success at work and excellence in the field of life, and achieving the goals and desires that she seeks After that, building cement for the house in one dream is evidence of a close relationship with a virtuous and righteous person characterized by high and generous morals. As for the cement vision of a single girl, this is evidence that she avoids people, has a great relationship with strangers, and needs to be careful. Seeing an unmarried woman She is afflicted with broken cement, evidence of her bad psychological state. In addition to his lack of contact and separation from the preacher. Seeing a single girl eating cement in a dream shows her love for serving and helping others and those around her. They also give them some money to help. Seeing cement in a dream for a married woman. Seeing white cement in the color of a married woman is evidence On justice in the situation, offspring, kindness, and food. When you see cement in general for a married woman, this is evidence of the strength of the relationship, affection, and compassion between the husband and his assistant in everything. Seeing a cement bag for a married woman is evidence of good morals and status. As well as the exchange of love between her and her family and the satisfaction of the Most Merciful. Cement in a dream for a married woman: This is evidence of the husband’s success in the field of work and his obtaining a promotion or a high and prestigious position. A married woman’s vision of dark-colored cement is evidence of multiple differences, and the woman is going through a difficult stage of pressure, and the quarrel between the two partners is a stage that passes. Interpretation of seeing cement for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman buying Cement, this indicates food for the male child, and God knows best, especially if the vision is in the first months of pregnancy. This girl makes her heart very happy with him and fills her life with love and happiness. Seeing a pregnant woman walking on cement indicates the ease and ease of the installation process, God willing. Seeing a pregnant woman with cement. It indicates that the time of her birth is approaching, and it will be easy, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing cement for a man in a dream. If one dreams of carrying cement in the hands of a man, this indicates that he is suffering from difficulties, fatigue, and hardships, and he is likely to travel soon, which will lead to an improvement in his financial condition. And when you see concrete Cement for a man in a dream, this indicates a close relationship with the husband

title: Interpretation of a dream about Saudi Arabia in a dream: Traveling to Saudi Arabia in a dream

preview.html: Content: I dreamed that I was in Saudi Arabia, I traveled by plane, by car, by train, for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, seeing the King of Saudi Arabia, the Custodian of the Two Holy Mosques The Two Holy Mosques and the flag of Saudi Arabia by Ibn Sirin SaudiSaudi Arabia is necessarily a good sign in The dream, according to several factors, the most important of which is the word itself, which comes from Saad, and means luck, blessing, pleasure and happiness. The same applies to science and science. If you look at the flag of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, you will find the following phrase: “There is no god but God, and Muhammad is the Messenger of God.” The phrase includes monotheism and martyrdom, and the name of His Majesty is repeated on two occasions, and is one of the attributes of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace. The green color of the Saudi flag means good and is one of the indications. Goodness, Fertility, and Blessing If a believer or believer dreams of traveling to the land of Saudi Arabia or residing in one of its cities, such as Mecca, Medina, Jeddah, or Riyadh, then he is safe from all harm. Traveling to the Kingdom indicates victory and success. The girl who sees in her dream that she is traveling to the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia during the Hajj period, she will achieve something worthy of praise, such as ruling or marriage, or succeed in the matter she desires. As for the unmarried girl who sees in her dream She is wearing the uniform of the people of Hijaz, then she will be affected by money or goods and the dream could be a sign of covering, protection and safety. The best thing in a dream about traveling to the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia is for the girl to be covered with a veil and not adorned. It is better for an unmarried woman to see herself praying in the Sacred Mosque or The Kaaba or near the Prophet’s Mosque. If a married woman is preparing or expecting to travel to the Kingdom outside the scope of Hajj or Umrah, and she sees that she is coming to that blessed land, then her trip to the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia will be confirmed, God willing, and she may have. As a result of whatever worldly matters he wants (work, money, livelihood, stability). As for a married woman who has not yet given birth and is keen to do so, if she sees that she is praying near the Kaaba or in her stomach, then this desire will come true, God willing, especially if she sees that she is praying near the Kaaba or in her stomach. In a dream, she extends her hand in supplication or supplication to God Almighty. If a married woman dreams that she meets the King and King of Saudi Arabia, this indicates something good will happen to her in this world. If a married woman sees that she has married a man from Saudi Arabia, This is interpreted as happiness, luck, or pleasure. This interpretation applies to unmarried women, pregnant women, widows and other divorcees. A pregnant woman who sees that she has traveled to Saudi Arabia for Hajj will be blessed with a male child. The good thing about seeing the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia is seeing the pregnant woman as if she lives there or mixes with her family. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is giving birth or giving birth in The Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, this is one of the signs of goodness and prosperity that it will witness in the future. title: Interpretation of a dream about running through an orchard in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about running in an orchard in a dream Some people are looking for an interpretation of a dream about running in an orchard in a dream, which is one of the interpretations that some people want to know the meaning of this dream and whether it is a sign of good or evil.. The truth of the dream and its interpretation is good and it is the jurisprudence of scholars. Interpretation of a dream about running in an orchard in a dream Anyone who dreams of running in an orchard can indicate the dreamer's upcoming joys at that time. Falling into an unfamiliar orchard in a dream may indicate the confidence that the dreamer feels in those days. If one sees that he is in an orchard with someone, this may indicate the affection and mercy that exists between them. A person's dream that he was running in an orchard in a dream may indicate his good social relationships thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about running on the road in a dream Anyone who sees in his dream that he is running very quickly on the road, this may indicate his many skills and abilities to succeed. Running on the road in a dream can mean bearing a great responsibility thanks to God. If someone sees that he was running in a dream and does not know in which direction, this may indicate his fear of his future and cannot determine his goals. Running on the road in a dream is evidence of the great effort and energy that the owner has The vision to achieve his dreams. Interpretation of a dream of running in the dark in a dream Seeing yourself running in the dark in a dream may indicate the dreamer's desire to isolate himself from others. Seeing him running in the dark in a dream may mean that he was feeling lonely at that time, and God knows best. If one sees that he was running in the dark, this may indicate the rejection of the negative feelings that the visionary was going through at that time, and God knows best. If one sees that he is running in the dark, this may indicate the benefit he gets after the suffering that the dreamer endured in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of running in the desert in a dream Running in the desert in a dream may indicate that there are a large number of happy things in the dreamer's life at that time. If one sees that he was running in the desert, this may indicate the happy times that the dreamer went through at that time. Seeing running in the desert in a dream may indicate the happiness and joy that the dreamer experiences during this time, thanks to God. The dream of running in the desert in a dream may indicate that the dreamer is going through a difficult period in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of running barefoot in a dream A person who sees that he is barefoot may indicate that he is going through a crisis Very big at that time and needs to ask for help from God. Seeing yourself running barefoot in a dream may indicate a major financial crisis and the dreamer may be exposed to this period. A person’s dream that he was running barefoot may indicate a deterioration in the psychological life of the vision during this period. Seeing yourself running barefoot in a dream may indicate some sorrows and fears that its owner was facing at that time, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a stripper in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a stripper in a dream in detail. Taking him off means giving up clothes, which is a bad thing and one of the absolutely unpopular things that God Almighty has forbidden, but what is the decision in interpreting the dream of taking off the clothes of a person or woman in a dream and what it shows we will examine through Our article on the hospice website, where we learn about the signs and indicators that appear naked, and this vision is according to Al-Azim. Arab translators and scholars, as we know that the interpretation of nudity in a dream varies from one person to another. Interpretation of seeing naked people in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Imam Al-Nabulsi believes that taking off clothes in a dream indicates many problems and misfortunes that occur in the life of the dreamer, God forbid. And he may be exposed to many. Real problems and crises, and the appearance of the private area in a dream is a heavy matter, a scandal, and a lot of debt. It has also been explained elsewhere that the scarcity of the face of some foreigners indicates the need for money, financial crises, and perhaps the proximity of poverty and the loss of oneself and a child. Looking at the naked body in a dream is annoying and brings a lot of Of harm and misery, and this vision may indicate imprisonment or loss of one’s profession. Seeing a sick person in his dream naked is a good vision that indicates an imminent recovery and the removal of worry and distress by God’s command, and he may obtain help and livelihood from a legitimate source. Dying without clothes in a dream is poverty and distress. Essential, and in some cases it indicates an improvement in the physical and psychological condition of the dreamer and his family. Naked in front of crowds of people indicates scandal or indecency and the commission of many bad rituals in reality. This vision can be a warning and alert for the pioneer to return to God and release the captive captivity. You may see An unmarried woman sees herself half-naked in a dream or someone forcefully removes her clothes. If someone sees himself stripped of his clothes in the workplace, it means that he is being spoken ill of in his absence and it may reflect the dreamer's unpleasant personality. Imam Al-Nabulsi believes that nudity in the workplace is nothing but illness and poverty. Interpretation of a dream about nudity for a single woman. Imam Ibn Sirin believes that nudity for unmarried women in a dream is nothing but a close marriage with a man of good character. If an unmarried woman sees herself naked in front of a group of people This indicates the abundance of livelihood that you obtain by God’s command, and it may be money or the profession that you seek. Not wearing clothes at all in a dream are huge misfortunes and scandals that disturb the girl and bring her worry and sadness. Interpretation of a dream about being naked in a dream for a married woman. A married woman sees herself without clothes in a dream. The dream means dissolution of the marital relationship or separation from the husband, and in some cases the vision expresses sadness and great financial crises. A married woman may give up her clothes in a dream while she is in public places such as the market or work, and this indicates disasters and real crises and may portend a bad reputation among people. People. The nudity of a married woman in a dream is a sign of power, poverty, and perhaps loss of a job. Interpretation of a dream about taking off her clothes in a dream for a patient. Dream scholars see...

title: Interpretation of a dream about wearing clothes that do not cover the dream for senior imams

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about wearing clothes that do not cover them in a dreamToday and through the site Various, we will explain the interpretation of a dream about wearing clothes that do not cover them in a dream Islam urges us to wear a jacket, wear veiled clothes for men and women, and cover the private parts for both sexes.Interpretation of a dream about wearing inappropriate clothes in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about wearing inappropriate clothes It indicates indecency, scandals, revealing secrets, disagreements, problems, revealing hidden secrets, and the presence of people who want to reveal this dreamer’s secrets. Interpretation of a dream about wearing short clothes in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about wearing short clothes in a dream can indicate scandals or an unexpected rumor that could lead to a disaster in the dreamer’s life. . God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about wearing clothes that do not cover the dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about wearing clothes that do not cover a dream for a girl. Some of them are good for the girl and some of them may be bad from seeing a dream about the arrival of a good husband for this girl and accepting marriage, a jacket, abundant food, acquiring work and a habit, and having friends, and this also It indicates her bad reputation due to her inappropriate behavior, and God Almighty knows best. Click on the image to go to the store and complete the purchase. Interpretation of a dream about wearing clothes that do not cover a woman’s dream. Interpretation of dreams about wearing short clothes in a woman’s dream is that if she gets married, she will be exposed to marital disputes that may lead to divorce. It may also indicate that some relatives have been exposed to sudden death, God forbid. You should know. The interpretation of a dream about wearing clothes that do not cover a pregnant woman in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about a pregnant woman being naked in a dream is not good, because it indicates problems and fears and also indicates the coming of childbirth, but she will face some problems during childbirth, but if she sees herself naked in this It indicates the arrival of sustenance, kindness, and caring for a good, pious child, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of a dream about wearing clothes that do not cover the world in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin explained that I wear clothes that indicate scandals and problems that the dreamer may be exposed to and that may come on his way from the people closest to him. Interpretation Dreaming about wearing clothes that were not covered by Nabulsi’s dream, the Nabulsi scholar explained that wearing inappropriate clothes if a married woman sees that she is wearing immodest clothes in front of her husband, it can be a source of anxiety, but if she wears them in front of other people, this means scandals, misfortunes, and impotence. To solve these problems that lead to divorce, and God Almighty knows best. As for the divorced woman, if she sees that she is wearing revealing clothes, come, because this divorced woman has not preserved her reputation, that she is far from worship, that she is vulnerable to magic and envy, and that she has broken her heart. An orphan or poor person, and he complained about his situation to God, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of a dream about wearing old clothes in a dreamInterpretation of seeing wearing old dirty clothes in a dream leads to poverty, a change in attitude, bad morals, and calmness from anger, but if these clothes are clean, this means good marital relations and a solution. Disagreements and entering into good relationships, because they are saturated with judgment

title: Interpretation of seeing a tooth falling out in a dream

preview.html: Decrease in age in a dreamA place believed to be seen Decrease in age in a dream It is one of the visions that can cause anxiety in many people, which prompts them to search for its meanings in general, whether they are good or bad signs. Decrease in age in a dream Teeth in a dream can represent many things that are happening In the life of the viewer or his family, each tooth can refer to a member of the viewer’s family, and each of them expresses a different topic, but in general, seeing teeth falling out can indicate illness, death, or other matters that may affect the viewer or his family. And about that. We will explain to you through this article on the site the various interpretations of falling age in a dream and other important topics related to the same vision in the following lines. Interpretation of a tooth falling out in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Seeing the upper teeth falling out in a man’s dream indicates the people in his family and their status. As for the lower teeth in a dream, they It represents a woman. Seeing a dog in a dream represents the master of the house or the person responsible for the affairs of the house. But seeing the right lane represents the father, while the left lane shows the uncle. Also, seeing teeth in a dream can express the condition of the viewer’s children, siblings, friends, or people in a similar way. General. Seeing the upper tooth falling out in a dream. Seeing the upper teeth falling out is a sign of the arrival of money to the dreamer. As for seeing the dreamer’s teeth falling out in his room, this indicates a son, as God Almighty says: “He speaks to the people of the cradle.” The upper molars can be considered a sign of grandparents or young children. But the lower fold is considered a sign of the mother, and the left fold is considered a sign of the aunt. The lower quarter is considered a sign of cousins. Seeing gold teeth is considered a praiseworthy vision if the dreamer has knowledge. But if someone with the same eyesight does not bring knowledge, then eyesight is not good and may indicate On illness or fire. Seeing silver teeth is a sign of losing money. As for seeing teeth made of wood or glass, it is a sign of the near death of the fortuneteller or one of his relatives. Read also: Interpretation of seeing King Salman in a dream and talking to him according to Ibn Sirin. Seeing teeth falling out in the imam’s dream Al-Sadiq: Seeing the loss of one’s lifespan in a dream was explained by Imam Al-Sadiq to us with several different interpretations that indicate the condition of the Messenger or his family, with the following details: Seeing teeth falling out in general, according to Imam Al-Sadiq’s interpretation, expresses what is happening to the people of the viewer in terms of life issues, such as death, illness, calamities, problems, and others. It can be It can also be a sign of sustenance in the dreamer’s life. Teeth falling out can be a sign of gaining or losing a business. Teeth may be an indication of the benefit or benefit that the dreamer will gain, but this depends on the events of the vision in general. Seeing teeth falling out is a sign of Separation and sadness. A tooth falling out in a dream can be a sign of harm from close people. Lower teeth falling out in a dream. Seeing all the lower teeth falling out in a dream is a sign of the death of the dreamer’s relatives and that

title: Interpretation of a dream about a snake wrapping around my leg by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a snake wrapped around my legs can have many meanings and connotations for the dreamer, depending on what exactly he sees during his sleep. He may dream that a huge snake is wrapped around his legs or that one of his legs is attached to him, and the sleeper may see the snake strangling him by the neck or trying to wrap around his arms. Interpretation of a dream about a snake wrapped around my legs Interpretation of a dream about a snake wrapped around my legs may indicate the presence of many difficulties and problems in the dreamer's life and that he must work hard and seek help from God Almighty to reach stability and get rid of pressures. The dream of a snake wrapped around the dreamer's feet may remind him of the need to get closer to God Almighty in word and deed and stay away from wrong actions so that the Lord of the Worlds blesses him in his life and helps him in that. His way. Dreaming of a snake trying to pass around my feet and I kill it may foretell the dreamer that he may soon triumph over his enemies and therefore he should not stop making efforts to achieve victory, and of course the dreamer must rely on God Almighty. Interpretation of a dream of a snake wrapping around my legs by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that a dream of a snake wrapping around my legs can warn of the presence of some haters around the dreamer. It can refer to bad friends who can cause a lot of problems for the dreamer, so he should avoid them and focus on accompanying good people, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of a snake wrapping around my legs for a single woman A dream of a snake wrapping around my legs for an unmarried girl can warn that there is an evil person trying to get close to the fortune teller and she should avoid him so as not to harm herself and regret it later, and of course she should pray to God a lot so that he does not harm her and for the dream of snakes wrapping around my feet, this may indicate the presence of some family disputes between the owner of the vision and her family members and she must work hard to get rid of these differences. And restores stability with the help of God Almighty. The girl may see a black snake in her dream, and here the dream of the snake basically symbolizes the difficulties of practical life and study that the dreamer may face and that he should not give in to despair, but must work hard and diligently and I ask God Almighty to ease the situation and bring relief so that the dream returns. So that He guides her, Glory be to Him, to goodness. Interpretation of a dream about a snake wrapping around my leg for a married woman A dream about a snake wrapping around my leg for a married woman can warn her of haters and people with bad intentions and she must choose who she deals with carefully so that no one harms her and her family. Problems with the husband and frequent quarrels, and here the owner of the vision must take care of her life and try to reconcile with her husband so that stability and security return to their home together, and God knows best. Regarding the dream of a red snake, it can alert the dreamer that she is lagging behind in her religion and that she must stop sinning and disobedience and return to God Almighty and repent to Him, Glory be to Him, more than he has. Come before. The dreamer is optimistic and prays to God that what she wants will come soon. Interpretation of a dream about a snake wrapping around the legs of a pregnant woman. A dream about a snake wrapping around the legs may indicate that the pregnant woman

title: Hair oil in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: And if her hair is beautiful after applying oil, this indicates her imminent marriage to a good and righteous person, and he will make her happy in her life. Interpretation of seeing oily hair in a dream for a single girl Seeing an unmarried woman dyeing her hair with oil is a sign of the great success that she will soon see in her life. Also, seeing oily hair is a sign of distinction in practical or scientific life, God willing. And if the unmarried woman is not engaged and dyes her hair with oil, it is a sign of her future marriage. Ibn Sirin explains that putting oil on the hair of an unmarried woman will save her from the difficult matters she is going through. And if she looks at the oil and wants to put it in her hair, this indicates the success of difficult matters. On the other hand, seeing oil in a dream and putting oil on the hair indicates justice and goodness. And if she buys oil and draws it in her hair, this is interpreted as her marriage to someone she loves and wants. Seeing oil poured into the hair and dyed with it indicates an abundance of money for an unmarried girl. See also: Interpretation of a dream about lice in the hair for a girl Interpretation of seeing oily hair in a dream for a married woman Seeing a married woman Dyeing her hair with oil means that she will succeed in problems and troubles. And if he took oil for her and dyed her hair with it, this interprets the happy life she lives. Seeing a married woman putting oil on her hair in a dream, interprets her diligence in her married life. While a married woman looks at oily hair in a dream, this is interpreted as the happiness she sees. And if she pours a lot of oil on her hair, this is a sign of her beautiful life. Seeing a married woman dyeing her hair with bad oil in a dream indicates her sin. It also explains the oil that dyes the hair, and it has a bad smell in the difficult topics in her life. Also, seeing beautiful hair oil in a dream indicates money, work and livelihood for it. Interpretation of seeing oily hair in a dream for a divorced woman Seeing a divorced woman dyeing her hair with oil indicates the approaching date of marriage, God willing. And if she looks at the oil and cannot dye her hair, this indicates the problems of her life. Applying oil to the hair is interpreted as the difficult things she goes through, lives and ends. And the divorced women who buy bad oil and dye their hair with it is evidence of her bad reputation in life. And if she takes the oil from someone Close to her, and dyed her hair with it, this explains the end of difficult matters. And the sick divorcee who puts oil in her hair announces that she is about to recover from all her problems. Ibn Sirin indicates that seeing hair oil and applying it to marriage benefits her and her family. If she is looking for oil to dye her hair, this indicates her search for an important issue that occupies a space in her life. Interpretation of seeing oily hair in a dream for a man and its meaning It indicates that a man will live a happy life free of troubles dyed in hair. And if he dyes his hair with bad-smelling oil, this explains the difficulty of the life he lives. And that seeing oil in the hair in a dream indicates success in work and knowledge, God willing. He explains that putting oil in a dream on the hair is a clear indication of

title: Interpretation of burning in a dream for single, married and pregnant women

preview.html: In this article, we present to you the interpretation of burning in a dream and its meaning in detail. Seeing a burn is one of the most disturbing visions that a dreamer can think of, because exposure to this accident is actually one of the most dangerous accidents that can happen to a person and can cause him serious injuries. The types of these burns vary from simple and superficial burns that often occur at home Such as exposure to stings from touching hot pans or hot oil while cooking, to severe burns that do not only affect the outer skin but extend to the bones and joints, but this vision symbolizes and is it not in the interest of the viewer? We will know this in the encyclopedia. Interpretation of burn in a dream. Interpretation of a vision. Burning in a dream by Ibn SirinImam Ibn Sirin narrated that seeing oneself burning in a dream is one of the dreamer’s undesirable visions, which carry many bad interpretations, including being exposed to crimes and gossip. If the dreamer sees that he was burned in a dream and his face was struck, then this vision indicates that the dreamer He is controlled by fear and anxiety about something in reality, or this dream is a sign of his hypocrisy. And deceiving those around him. If the dreamer sees that he has been burned in a dream and finds smoke coming out of his body, then this vision indicates the dreamer’s bad psychological state, which is represented by his feeling of anxiety and sadness. Ibn Sirin also indicated that if the dreamer dreams of many burns that have befallen his body, then this vision It indicates that he went through many crises and obstacles in his life. Interpretation of the dream of burning a hand. Regarding the meaning of the dream of burning a hand specifically, if only the right hand is burning, then this vision is one of the good visions that symbolizes success and excellence, whether in work or study, and God knows best. On the other hand, in In the case of a burn in the left hand, this vision indicates a failure to achieve what the dreamer seeks, whether emotionally or professionally. Interpretation of a burn in a dream for a single woman. As for the meaning of this dream for an unmarried girl, if she sees a fire in a dream, this vision indicates that she She went through many radical changes in her life. Seeing burning in general in an unmarried woman’s dream is a good vision and indicates that she will marry someone she loves in reality, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees that she is burning in her hands, this vision shows her love for doing good and helping those in need, and this The vision is a reflection of her bad psychological state. Interpretation of a dream of a married woman burning. As for the interpretation of this dream for a married woman, it is also a praiseworthy vision for her and an indication of goodness and happiness, as it indicates that she will become pregnant soon, and God knows best. If a married woman sees in a dream that she is touching fire in a dream, then this The vision expresses her need for help in reality. If a married woman sees that her face is burned, then this vision indicates the sins and transgressions that she is committing in reality. Interpretation of seeing a burn in a dream for a pregnant woman. Regarding the meaning of this dream for a pregnant woman, if she sees that her child has been burned in a dream, This vision indicates that she has gone through many problems and crises
